Reference

All functions

createCcrAnalysis()

Create a case-crossover analysis specification

createExposureOutcomeNestingCohort()

Create exposure-outcome-nesting-cohort combinations.

createGetDbCaseCrossoverDataArgs()

Create a parameter object for the function getDbCaseCrossoverData

createGetExposureStatusArgs()

Create a parameter object for the function getExposureStatus

createMatchingCriteria()

Create matching criteria

createSelectSubjectsToIncludeArgs()

Create a parameter object for the function selectSubjectsToInclude

fitCaseCrossoverModel()

Fit case-crossover model

getAttritionTable()

Get the attrition table for a set of subjects

getDbCaseCrossoverData()

Load case-crossover data from the database

getExposureStatus()

Get the exposure status for cases (and controls).

loadCaseCrossoverData()

Load the case data from a folder

loadCcrAnalysisList()

Load a list of ccrAnalysis from file

loadExposureOutcomeNestingCohortList()

Load a list of exposureOutcomeNestingCohort from file

runCcrAnalyses()

Run a list of analyses

saveCaseCrossoverData()

Save the case-crossover data to folder

saveCcrAnalysisList()

Save a list of ccrAnalysis to file

saveExposureOutcomeNestingCohortList()

Save a list of drugComparatorOutcome to file

selectSubjectsToInclude()

Select subjects to include

summarizeCcrAnalyses()

Create a summary report of the analyses
